@graph.headline: LLM & ChatGPT Text Prompts Versus JSON Prompts
@graph.description: Prompting has become one of the most important skills for many businesses all over the world. It’s not going away. As a business, we use AI and GPTs heavily for productivity flow, content outlines, and even content creation. There are times we use text prompt, and there are times we use JSON prompts. about.description: Plain text inputs provided to large language models to generate responses for natural language processing tasks

about.name: JSON AI Prompts
about.description: Structured data inputs using JavaScript Object Notation format to provide detailed and organized information to AI models

about.name: Large Language Models

about.name: OptizenAI

about.name: Natural Language Processing
about.description: Branch of AI that helps computers understand and process human language

acceptedAnswer.text: AI text prompts are plain text inputs provided to an LLM to generate responses. These prompts are often used in chatbots, content generation, and other NLP tasks.

JSON AI prompts are structured data inputs used to provide detailed and organized information to an AI model. JSON is a lightweight data-interchange format that is easy for humans to read and write, and easy for machines to parse and generate.

@graph.name: AI Text Prompts
@graph.description: Plain text inputs provided to an LLM to generate responses, often used in chatbots, content generation, and other NLP tasks

@graph.name: JSON AI Prompts
@graph.description: Structured data inputs used to provide detailed and organized information to an AI model using JavaScript Object Notation format

@graph.name: Tokenization
@graph.description: Process where input text is split into smaller units (tokens) that the model can understand

@graph.name: Natural Language Processing
@graph.description: AI technology that enables computers to understand, interpret, and generate human language

@graph.name: Large Language Models
@graph.description: AI models designed to understand and generate human-like text based on training data
